title: Amazing 2 bed, 2 bath condo with reserved parking space
posting_body: Amazing 2 bed, 2 bath condo in a three-unit building with a private balcony as well as a shared rooftop space with patio furniture and views of the skyline.
Everything from bathrooms to kitchen is updated and includes an in-unit washer/dryer.
Reserved parking space in the back as well.
Available for rent beginning August 1 or any date after.
Appliances are new and the living room features a fireplace with a mantle for the cold months.
Plenty of storage space, including two big closets in each bedroom and a coat closet in the hallway.
Master bedroom has an en suite bathroom with a separate stand up shower and soaking tub with jets as well as two sinks.
Second bathroom has large walk-in shower with build-in shelves and half step.
5-7 minute walk to blue line station.
Surrounded by amazing restaurants and parks.
Easy access to the freeway if needed.
In the heart of one of the coolest areas of the city (Logan Square/Bucktown/Wicker Park), but still feels very homey and comfortable.
